titleStmt.title: Londini quod reliquum, or, Londons remains in Latin and English.
Londini quod reliquum. English & Latin
titleStmt.author: Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Written by Simon Ford. Cf. Wing and NUC pre-1956.
"Actio in Londini incendarios": 16 p. at end.
Latin and English on opposite pages numbered in duplicate.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
